AdditionalServiceItem.name: Analysis of development
AdditionalServiceItem.text: Analysis of development potential for contiguous land under the same ownership.

AdditionalServiceItem.name: Changes requested after substantial completion.
AdditionalServiceItem.text: Changes to the plan requested by any Board, 3rd party reviewer or the Client after substantial completion.

AdditionalServiceItem.name: Construction layout services
AdditionalServiceItem.text: Construction layout services may be required by your contractor. We will provide you with an estimate for the layout work if this is necessary.

AdditionalServiceItem.name: Leeching facility
AdditionalServiceItem.text: At times sanitary disposal systems involve pumping to the leaching facility. If your system requires a pump an additional $250 will be charged.

AdditionalServiceItem.name: Local Upgrade Approval Application
AdditionalServiceItem.text: If a Local Upgrade Approval Application with the %TOWN% Board of Health is necessary for this septic system repair, abutters will be notified of the hearing by certified mail/return receipt requested and we shall attend the public hearing (estimate of 1 hearing). The fee for this service is $500 exclusive of postage to notify abutters.

AdditionalServiceItem.name: Resolve property line or title error
AdditionalServiceItem.text: Work required to resolve a property line or title error is not included. We have assumed that records deeds and plans are free from error and that property line monuments can be reasonably located near the premises.

AdditionalServiceItem.name: Survey or wetland delineation with snow ground cover
AdditionalServiceItem.text: Survey or wetland delineation with snow ground cover.

AdditionalServiceItem.name: Work associated with any other offsite mitigation.
AdditionalServiceItem.text: Work associated with any other offsite mitigation.
